page.title: 05RECREATION 1
page.content: { { The Golf Course. { } On a busy weekend this is used by 130 people but during the week it is usually 60 or 70 people a day. This is a{public course}and people pay to use it-Â£2.50 for an adult Â£1.25 for O.A.P.or junior. There is also a{club}that uses the course and they charge Â£7.50 to join and an annual subscription of Â£6.00 which entitles you to enter competitions and gain an official handicap but you still have to pay green fees. To play golf you can use your own clubs or hire them but you must have a pair of golf shoes.
